title: House with 2 Buildings 15 Perches
details:
House for sale in Negombo.
Land extent is 15 Perches.
Quiet and calm neighborhood.
Easy access to the beach, main road, Town etc.

5 total bedroom, Large store room (can break the wall and use as a garage for two vehicles), study room,

Outdoor garage, ample greenery in the front yard, back yard as a well and outdoor area as well.

One of the building is old and the other needs some painting. With the renovation, can even use as a vintage guest house.

Cemented road and we'll maintained.
